definition: cartilaginous fishes/Chondrichthyes (taxonomic class including sharks and rays)

sentences.english: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的鱼类，它们是一夫一妻制并终生厮守。

sentences.english: It's easier to drink with no fishy taste .
sentences.chinese: 去除了鱼类原有的鱼腥味，变得更为容易饮用。

sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 托丽里奇说，他是伟大的全年性，为鱼类和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: These results indicated that avermectin has potential damages to fish liver.
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了阿维菌素对鱼类肝脏的损伤作用。

sentences.english: He fed the plant a mixture containing fish and  seaweed.
sentences.chinese: 他用一种含有鱼类和海藻的混合物给植物施肥。

sentences.english: Clam chowders have --- as the name suggests --- clams and fish stock.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊海鲜杂烩里面还有蛤蜊和鱼类高汤。

sentences.english: So far, over ten fishes have been studied in more than twenty count-ries.
sentences.chinese: 目前已有十多个国家对十几种鱼类进行了这一研究。

sentences.english: Fishes are not alone in this situation.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，鱼类是团体活动的。

sentences.english: It typically has a few different types of fish, clams, mussels and prawns.
sentences.chinese: 它通常由好几种鱼类，蛤蜊，贻贝和对虾熬成。

sentences.english: The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝也进一步威胁着长江濒危鱼类的种群繁殖。

sentences.english: There are over 500 species of fish. Fujian is one of the main fishing areas in China.
sentences.chinese: 鱼类达500多种，是我国主要产鱼区。

sentences.english: Lanshan is teemed with varieties of fishes and rare seafood.
sentences.chinese: 岚山盛产各种鱼类和海珍品。

sentences.english: Elasmobranch study is weak comparatively in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国对板鳃鱼类的研究比较薄弱。

sentences.english: But birds don't have ‘em, nor do reptiles or fish.
sentences.chinese: 但是鸟类没有血小板，爬行动物和鱼类也没有。

sentences.english: Water quality and self-purification capability of lakes are greatly influenced by the community structure of fish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼类群落结构影响着湖泊的水质和水体的自净能力。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
